meanings.definition: The action or process of making or becoming greater in size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The augmentation of the cake with extra frosting made it even more delicious.
meanings.sent2: The augmentation of the population in the city led to increased traffic.
meanings.sent3: The augmentation of the dog's bark with a squeaky toy made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The augmentation of the garden with colorful flowers turned it into a vibrant paradise.
meanings.sent5: The augmentation of the music with drums made the song more exciting.

meanings.definition: The amount by which something is increased or enlarged.
meanings.sent1: She was thrilled by the augmentation of her allowance this month.
meanings.sent2: The augmentation of the team's score in the last quarter secured their victory.
meanings.sent3: The augmentation of the ice cream scoop with extra sprinkles made it irresistible.
meanings.sent4: The augmentation of the painting with a bold frame enhanced its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The augmentation of the book collection with new titles brought joy to the readers.

meanings.definition: The process of adding to or enhancing something.
meanings.sent1: The augmentation of the presentation with visuals made it more engaging.
meanings.sent2: The augmentation of the flavors in the dish created a delightful taste.
meanings.sent3: The augmentation of the party with a surprise guest made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: The augmentation of the outfit with accessories elevated her style.
meanings.sent5: The augmentation of the garden with a fountain transformed it into a peaceful retreat.
